alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Benton, southwestern Walla Walla and south central Franklin Counties through 400 PM PDT... At 330 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wallula, or 15 miles southeast of Kennewick, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kennewick, Pasco, West Pasco, Island View, Wallula, Finley, Burbank and Highland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
